Module ReservationService
Package pl.polsl.lab.view

Class PatientView

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.lab.view.PatientView
public class PatientView
extends java.lang.Object
Represents view structure of MVC, which prints and gets information from user using UI, in this case - console.
Version:
1.0

      Parameters:

      phoneNum - the phone number
      date - date of registration
      doctor - chosen doctor by patient
